titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to identify additional factors for the design of the counseling pathways of the Transition Assistance Program.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to identify additional factors for the design of the counseling pathways of the Transition Assistance Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill adds additional factors for the design of the counseling pathways to address the needs of members of the Armed Forces under the Transition Assistance Program.
